## ProgressWindow.hideThenCloseIfEmpty() method

Hide the window. Then, after a delay, close it if there are no items.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hideThenCloseIfEmpty(): Promise<void>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
